Summary: Saw a large spherical object with a band or ridge
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking down my driveway toward the mail box. The weather was mostlycloudy with a strong wind blowing north to south. The clouds were moving fast. I just happened to look up as the clouds parted and there it was. I knew theobject was not anything I had ever seen before or since. I stopped and lookedat it for about three or four seconds. The object did not move. It made nosound that I noticed. Then the clouds closed in again concealed the object. Istood watching that spot in the sky for a minute or two until the clouds openedagain but the object was not there any longer. I looked around the sky for afew minutes but did not see it again.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Williamston
This sighting has never been favorited.
